description.brief: This component serves as a gate which passes images to TMTC and images + data to processing components

package.description: This component receives telecommands from the TM/TC component and outputs (possibly periodically) image frames to TM/TC or frames and additional data to processing components for more complex data products, such as DEMs.
package.author: Levin Gerdes/levin.gerdes@esa.int
